blogs.title: My html/CSS learning journey . . .
blogs.body: I started learning HTML and CSS in August 2021, I was already familiar with some keywords, this was the easiest part, I only spent a week learning the basics . . .

blogs.title: Javascript Time
blogs.body: This was the hardest part of all, there was a lot of new information and ways of thinking, data structures and algorithms took most of my time, I spent a month learning the basics . . .
blogs.author: Walid
